title: Type-bound procedure declaration (Generics) is not implemented
body:
Example:
```fortran
module x
    type :: toml_date
        integer :: year = 0
        integer :: month = 0
        integer :: day = 0
    contains
        generic :: assignment(=) => to_string                 ! <-----------
        procedure, pass(rhs) :: to_string => date_to_string
    end type
contains
    subroutine date_to_string(lhs, rhs)
    character(kind=1, len=:), allocatable, intent(out) :: lhs
    class(toml_date), intent(in) :: rhs
    allocate(character(kind=1, len=10) :: lhs)
    write(lhs, '(i4.4,"-",i2.2,"-",i2.2)') &
        &  rhs%year, rhs%month, rhs%day
    end subroutine date_to_string
end module

program debug
    use x
    implicit none
    character(:), allocatable :: a
    type(toml_date) :: b
    b%year = 2022; b%month = 12; b%day = 20
    call date_to_string(a, b)
    print *, a
end program debug
```
```
    case procedure_declType::GenericAssignment: { v.visit_GenericAssignment((const GenericAssignment_t &)x); return; }
LCompilersException: visit_GenericAssignment() not implemented
```
```
    case procedure_declType::GenericOperator: { v.visit_GenericOperator((const GenericOperator_t &)x); return; }
LCompilersException: visit_GenericOperator() not implemented
```
